attributes.action: Implement a fair North/South Covid-19 Tier system
attributes.additional_details: It’s punitive that most of the North, have been placed into Tier 3 highest risk, after the second lockdown, when London are in Tier 2. This needs to be urgently reviewed as a government priority. The Greater Manchester area have worked as hard as have Merseyside area in reducing the R rate.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are unhappy with the Government's decisions about which areas have been put into which Tiers, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions calling for changes to the Tiers certain areas have been put into, which you might like to sign:

Put Lancaster into Tier 2 Covid Restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562010

Take South Kesteven & South Holland out of Tier 3: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562022

Reject Tier 3 restrictions in North East and impose Tier 2 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561980

If you want the Government to take an action not covered by the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
